sentences.en: A freckle - face blenny peeks from its reef burrow in the Solomon Islands.
sentences.cn: 奇特的海生物图片画廊.一只斑点面容粘鱼窥视从它的暗礁穴在所罗门群岛.

sentences.en: Denise Hyland was a tall, freckle - faced Irish girl with kind, beautiful eyes and an infectious smile.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯.海兰是个身材高挑 、 满脸雀斑的爱尔兰裔女孩, 眼睛温柔美丽,笑起来很有感染力.

sentences.en: He had short ginger-coloured hair and freckles.
sentences.cn: 他一头姜黄色的短发，脸上有些雀斑。

sentences.en: Photo Gallery : Marine Marvels A freckle - face blenny peeks from its reef burrow in the Solomon Islands.
sentences.cn: 海洋的奇迹图片.一条雀斑面孔的粘鱼在窥视从它的暗礁洞穴位于所罗门群岛.

sentences.en: She must have been 6 a beautiful brown - haired, freckle - faced girl. It was pouring outside.
sentences.cn: 这个漂亮的小女孩应该有6岁了,一头棕色的头发, 脸上长着雀斑.

sentences.en: She must have been 6 years old, this beautiful brown haired, freckle - faced image of innocence.
sentences.cn: 这个天真的小女孩应该6岁大了, 头发是美丽的棕色, 脸上有雀斑.

sentences.en: Skin care include: acupuncture massage, freckle facial mask, essence import, vitamin E skin care.
sentences.cn: 皮肤护理包括: 穴位按摩, 祛斑面膜, 精华素导入, 维生素E护肤.

sentences.en: Some people freckle more easily than others.
sentences.cn: 有些人容易比别人长雀斑.

sentences.en: The edible cucumber gruel, can eliminate the freckle, increase the white skin frequently.
sentences.cn: 经常食用黄瓜粥, 能消除雀斑 、 增白皮肤.

sentences.en: The girl used many kinds of cosmetics to remove the freckle on her face.
sentences.cn: 这个女孩用了很多种的化妆品来去掉她脸上的雀斑.

sentences.en: The pearl is efficacious in protecting human face from infringement freckle or speckle.
sentences.cn: 有护肤、美容、消除面部黑点、黑斑、暗疮、黑块等功效.

words.tran_cn: 生斑点；布满斑点（freckle的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: freckles are small brown spots on someone’s skin, especially on their face, which the sun can cause to increase in number and become darker
